title: Pandora’s new mid-term targets

content:encoded:
Reuters was 24 seconds ahead on Sept 14 with the news that Danish jewelry maker Pandora announced revenue growth target of 6-8% over 2021-2023.

The post Pandora’s new mid-term targets appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
